E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1993
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
I think it is time to leave the show. This will
probably be my last year. Just wanted to let you know!

Regards,
Tony Villalon



Date: Friday, 5/9/1993
Subject: Progress of Rolando Alexis
Dear Sir,
Rolando Alexis has nothing more to prove at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
He has an AVG of .280 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
